duties_responsibilities.duty: Keep the units, common areas, and offices clean and orderly.
Perform heavy cleaning duties such as cleaning floors, shampooing rugs, washing walls and glass, and removing rubbish.
Perform routine maintenance activities and notify management of the need for repairs.
Clean and maintain the health and safety standards of the facility within all federal, state, internal, and local standards and regulations.
Assist the facility in maintaining compliance with the regulations of the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA).
